languages.text: First kill per round with single shot from ranged Aeldari weapon provides an additional attack.

traits.locale_text: First kill per round with single shot from ranged Aeldari weapon provides an additional attack.

languages.text: When Yrliet kills a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack from Aeldari weapon for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, she immediately gains an additional attack.

traits.locale_text: When Yrliet kills a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack from Aeldari weapon for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, she immediately gains an additional attack.

When Yrliet kills a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack from Aeldari weapon for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, she immediately gains an additional attack.

When Yrliet kills a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack from Aeldari weapon for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, she immediately gains an additional attack.

languages.text: Когда Ирлиэт убивает цель {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночным выстрелом{/g} из эльдарского оружия впервые в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}, она немедленно может совершить дополнительную атаку.
languages.original_text: When Yrliet kills a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack from Aeldari weapon for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, she immediately gains an additional attack.

traits.locale_text: Когда Ирлиэт убивает цель {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночным выстрелом{/g} из эльдарского оружия впервые в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}, она немедленно может совершить дополнительную атаку.

Когда Ирлиэт убивает цель {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночным выстрелом{/g} из эльдарского оружия впервые в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}, она немедленно может совершить дополнительную атаку.

languages.text: ユリエットがこの{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めてアエルダリ武器の{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}で敵を殺す時、ユリエットが即座に追加攻撃を得る。
languages.original_text: When Yrliet kills a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack from Aeldari weapon for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, she immediately gains an additional attack.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットがこの{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めてアエルダリ武器の{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}で敵を殺す時、ユリエットが即座に追加攻撃を得る。

languages.text: Wenn Yrliet mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriff einer Aeldari-Waffe in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erstmals ein Ziel tötet, erhält sie sofort einen zusätzlichen Angriff.
languages.original_text: When Yrliet kills a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack from Aeldari weapon for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, she immediately gains an additional attack.

traits.locale_text: Wenn Yrliet mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriff einer Aeldari-Waffe in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erstmals ein Ziel tötet, erhält sie sofort einen zusätzlichen Angriff.

languages.text: Cuando Yrliet mata un objetivo con un ataque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}de un solo disparo{/g} de un arma Aeldari por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, gana inmediatamente un ataque adicional.
languages.original_text: When Yrliet kills a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack from Aeldari weapon for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, she immediately gains an additional attack.

traits.locale_text: Cuando Yrliet mata un objetivo con un ataque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}de un solo disparo{/g} de un arma Aeldari por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, gana inmediatamente un ataque adicional.

languages.text: 当伊莉耶特每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次使用艾达灵族武器的{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}击杀目标时，会立刻获得一次额外攻击。
languages.original_text: When Yrliet kills a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack from Aeldari weapon for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, she immediately gains an additional attack.

traits.locale_text: 当伊莉耶特每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次使用艾达灵族武器的{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}击杀目标时，会立刻获得一次额外攻击。

languages.text: Lorsqu'Yrliet tue une cible avec une attaque au {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}coup par coup{/g} portée avec une arme aeldari pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, elle gagne aussitôt une attaque supplémentaire.
languages.original_text: When Yrliet kills a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack from Aeldari weapon for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, she immediately gains an additional attack.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'Yrliet tue une cible avec une attaque au {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}coup par coup{/g} portée avec une arme aeldari pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, elle gagne aussitôt une attaque supplémentaire.

languages.text: Yrliet, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez Aeldari silahıyla {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atış{/g} saldırısı yaparak bir hedefi öldürdüğünde anında bir ilave saldırı kazanır.
languages.original_text: When Yrliet kills a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack from Aeldari weapon for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, she immediately gains an additional attack.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez Aeldari silahıyla {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atış{/g} saldırısı yaparak bir hedefi öldürdüğünde anında bir ilave saldırı kazanır.
